title: Come for the Amenities and Stay for the Location!
posting_body: Mediterranean Village welcomes you with beautifully manicured grounds and professional on-site management team.
Enjoy a day lounging at the pool or in one our cabanas, then playing into the night.
Just steps from your door, you can enjoy a host of area perks just blocks away on Santa Monica Blvd or the Sunset Strip.
Choose Mediterranean Village for its class, charm and convenience--this must be another world.
- Courtyard setting with tropical landscape, fountains, and koi pond
- Walking distance to Melrose Avenue shopping district
- Walking distance to the Beverly Center
- Walking distance to Santa Monica and Sunset Boulevard’s dining and grocery shopping
- 2 miles from The Grove and The Farmers Market
- Conveniently located to the 405, 10, and 101 freeways
- On-site management available 7 days a week
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*On select units and new move-ins only.
